1.title: Between Two Firs with Santa's Helper
1.plot: Sexy Holiday Parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis, laden with sexual innuendos and double entendres as the Host tries to help himself to a scantily clad Santa's Helper to fulfill his Christmas wish - Christmas sex.

2.title: Between Two Firs with Candy Cane Jane
2.plot: A Holiday Parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis where the Host tries to satisfy his sugar craving with his two guests, Candy Cane Jane and Candy - only he gets more than he bargained for with his offer to be their sugar daddy.

3.title: Between Two Firs with Sexy Santa
3.plot: Between Two Firs with Sexy Santa is a Holiday Parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis where the Host is determined to find out how naughty Sexy Santa has been with Santa Clause.

4.title: Between Two Firs with Frosty
4.plot: Between Two Firs with Frosty is a Parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis where the Host interviews a Frigid Frosty the Snow-woman and gets more than he bargained for when she gets a little hot under the collar.

locations: Brielle, New Jersey, USA::(interior house bar)
imdb.plot outline: Between Two Firs is a parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis. Laden with double entendres and sexual innuendos, the Host, Jack Phallic Anassis conducts a series of comedic interviews of some hot to trot holiday characters who get a little hot under the collar when they discover the topic of conversation is always sex sex sex.
imdb.title: Between Two Firs
plot: _Between Two Firs_ (qv) is a parody of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis. Laden with double entendres and sexual innuendos, the Host, Jack Phallic Anassis conducts a series of comedic interviews of some hot to trot holiday characters who get a little hot under the collar when they discover the topic of conversation is always sex sex sex.::Beth Rosen
